name: Berry Corporation
description: Berry Corporation is an independent oil and natural gas company based in the United States, primarily engaged in the acquisition, exploration, and production of oil and natural gas in the California region. Founded in 1909, Berry has a long-standing history in the energy sector and has established itself as a key player in the production of oil from the onshore Santa Barbara and San Joaquin basins. The company focuses on optimizing production from its existing assets while pursuing strategic acquisitions to expand its portfolio. Berry's operational excellence is driven by its commitment to safety, environmental stewardship, and efficient resource management. As the global energy landscape evolves, Berry Corporation aims to adapt and innovate by investing in technology and sustainable practices that enhance its production capabilities. The company is dedicated to delivering value to its shareholders while actively contributing to the energy needs of the communities it serves.
